Amisys Configuration Consultant 
Professional Summary 
Experienced Amisys Configuration Consultant with 11 years of expertise in leveraging Medicare 
research skills and medical billing coding knowledge to deliver impactful solutions. Proficient in 
performing detailed-oriented impact analysis and utilizing Excel to enhance operational 
efficiency. Dedicated to driving team success in a remote capacity for international recruitment 
and consultancy environments.

Regulations, Claims Processing

Data Analysis Impact Analysis, Data Visualization, SQL 
Excel Proficiency Excel VBA, Pivot Tables, Advanced Formulas 
Detail Orientation Quality Assurance, Audit Processes,

● Analyzed and interpreted large datasets within Amisys, leveraging Excel for 
visualization and trend identification.
